short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the screen from your computer in a conversation with consultant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share the screen from your computer in a Video call with a consultant in order to get prompt and relevant support. You can choose to share an entire screen, specific application or just a Chrome tab.

When you share your screen with a remote user, you are doing it in a view-only mode. Which means that the remote user does not have control over your PC and can only see the actions you are performing.
